1.2: Bhoomi niraakaaramugaanu shoonyamugaanu undenu; cheekati agaadha jalamula paina kammiyundenu; Devuni Aathma jalamulapaina allaaduchundenu.
1.3: Devudu "Velugu kalugunu gaaka" ani cheppenu; appudu velugu kaligenu.
1.4: Devudu velugunu choodaga adi manchidi ani telisenu; Devudu velugunu cheekatinundi veru chesenu.
1.5: Devudu veluguku "Pagalu" ani, cheekatiki "Raathri" ani peru pettunu; saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi modati dinam ayenu.
1.6: Devudu "Jalamula madhya oka aakaasham kalugunu gaaka; adi jalamulanu veru cheyunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.7: Devudu aakaashamunu srujinchi, aakaasham paina unna jalamulanu, aakaasham kinda unna jalamulanu veru chesenu; alaa ayenu.
1.8: Devudu aakaashamuku "Aakaashamu" ani peru pettunu; saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi rendava dinam ayenu.
1.9: Devudu "Aakaasham kindunna jalamulu okachota cherugunu gaaka; endina bhoomi kanabadunu gaaka" ani cheppenu; alaa ayenu.
1.10: Devudu endina bhoomiki "Bhoomi" ani, jalamula samuhamulaku "Samudramulu" ani peru pettunu; Devudu adi manchidi ani choosenu.
1.11: Devudu "Bhoomi meeda chettu mokkalu, viththanamulanu kaligina aakulu, tana tana jaathini anusarinchi phalamulu pande vrukshamulu molichunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.12: Bhoomi chettu mokkalu molipinchenu; viththanamulanu kaligina aakulu, tana tana jaathini anusarinchi phalamulu pande vrukshamulu molichenu; Devudu adi manchidi ani choosenu.
1.13: Saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi moodava dinam ayenu.
1.14: Devudu "Aakaashamandhu deepamulu kalugunu gaaka; avi pagalu raathrini veru cheyunu; kalamulaku, dinamulaku, samvatsaramulaku gurthulugaa undunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.15: Avi bhoomi meeda velugu ivvadaniki aakaashamandhu deepamulugaa undunu gaaka ani cheppenu; alaa ayenu.
1.16: Devudu rendu pedda deepamulanu srujinchenu; pedda deepam pagalu paalanaku, chinna deepam raathri paalanaku; nakshatramulanu kooda srujinchenu.
1.17: Devudu vatini bhoomi meeda velugu ivvadaniki aakaashamandhu pettunu.
1.18: Pagalu raathrini paalinchadaniki, velugunu cheekatini veru cheyadaniki pettunu; Devudu adi manchidi ani choosenu.
1.19: Saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi naalugava dinam ayenu.
1.20: Devudu "Jalamulu jeeva pranulatho nindunu gaaka; pakshulu bhoomi paina aakaashamandhu egarunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.21: Devudu pedda samudra jeevulanu, jalamulo chaliyinchu prathi jeevini, tana tana jaathini anusarinchi pakshulanu srujinchenu; Devudu adi manchidi ani choosenu.
1.22: Devudu vatini aasheervadinchi "Meeru vruddhi chendi, vistharinchi, samudra jalamulanu nimpandi; pakshulu bhoomi meeda vruddhi chendunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.23: Saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi aidava dinam ayenu.
1.24: Devudu "Bhoomi tana tana jaathini anusarinchi jeeva pranulanu, pashuvulanu, bhoomi jeevulanu puttinchunu gaaka" ani cheppenu; alaa ayenu.
1.25: Devudu bhoomi jeevulanu, pashuvulanu, tana tana jaathini anusarinchi srujinchenu; Devudu adi manchidi ani choosenu.
1.26: Devudu "Mana swaroopamuna, mana pratibimbamuna manishini srujiddamu; vaadu samudra chepalu, aakaasha pakshulu, pashuvulu, bhoomi anta, bhoomi meeda chaliyinchu prathi jeevini paalinchunu gaaka" ani cheppenu.
1.27: Devudu manishini tana swaroopamuna srujinchenu; Devuni swaroopamuna vaadini srujinchenu; magavaarigaa, aadavaarigaa vaarini srujinchenu.
1.28: Devudu vaarini aasheervadinchi "Meeru vruddhi chendi, vistharinchi bhoomiyini nimpandi; danini adheenam chesukondi" ani cheppenu.
1.29: Devudu "Bhoomi meeda unna prathi chettu mokka viththanamunu, phalamulu pande prathi vrukshamunu meeku aahaaramugaa ichchaanu" ani cheppenu.
1.30: Bhoomi meeda unna prathi jeeviki, aakaasha pakshulaku, jeeva pranamu unna prathi jeeviki pachcha mokkalu aahaaramugaa ichchaanu; alaa ayenu.
1.31: Devudu tanu chesina samastamunu choosenu; adi atyanta manchidi ayenu; saayantramunu, udhayamunu kalipi aarava dinam ayenu.

2.1: Ākāśamu bhūmiyu vāṭilōni samasta samūhamunu sampūrṇiñcabaḍenu.
2.2: Dēvuḍu tānu jēyu unna tana pani ēḍava dinamulōna sampūrṇi jēsi, tānu jēyu unna tana paniyantayu māni ēḍava dinamuna viśramin̄cenu.
2.3: Kāvuna Dēvuḍu ā ēḍava dinamunu āśīrvadin̄ci pariśud'dhaparacenu; ēlayananagā దానిలో దేవుడు తాను చేసినట్టియు, సృజించినట్టియు తన పని అంతటి నుండి విశ్రమించెను.

3.1: Dēvuḍaina prabhuvu cēsina aḍavi jantuvulalō sarpamu tantramugaladi. Adi strītō–idanijamēnā? Mīru ī tōṭa ceṭla phalalanu ē mātraṁ tinakūḍadani Dēvuḍu ceppenā ani aḍigagā,
3.2: strī–mēmu ī tōṭa ceṭla phalamulanu tinavaccunu;
3.3: Ayitē tōṭa madhyanunna ceṭṭi phalamu gurin̄ci Dēvuḍu–mīru cāvakayuṇḍunaṭlu vāṭini tinakūḍadu, muṭṭanukūḍadani ceppenani sarpamutō ceppenu.

1.1: Aadiyandu vākyamuṇḍenu, ā vākyamu Dēvuniyadda uṇḍenu, ā vākyamu Dēvuḍai uṇḍenu.
1.3: Samastamunu āyana mūlamugā kaligenu; kaligiyunna dēdiyunu āyana lēkuṇḍā kalugalēdu.
1.4: Āyanalō jīvamuṇḍenu; ā jīvamu manuṣyulaku velugai uṇḍenu.
1.5: Ā velugu cīkaṭilō prakāśin̄cucunnadi gāni cīkaṭi దాని గ్రహింపకుండెను.

2.1: Mūḍava dinamuna galilayalōni kānā anūrilō oka vivāhamu jarugagā yēsu talli akkaḍa uṇḍenu.
2.2: Ā vivāhamunaku yēsayunu āyana śiṣyulunu piluvabaḍiri.
2.3: Drākṣārasamu aipōyinaందున yēsu talli–vīriki drākṣārasamu lēdani āyanatō ceppagā
2.4: Yēsu–am'mā, nātō nīkēmi pani? Nā samayamu inka rālēdanenu.

3.1: Yūdulaku adhikāriyaina nīkodēmu anu pēru gala oka pharisayyuḍuṇḍenu.
3.2: Atanu rātri vēḷa yēsu nadda vacci– bōdhakuḍā, nīvu Dēvuniyadda nuṇḍi vaccina bōdhakuḍavani mĕm̆erugudumu; Dēvuḍu tanaku tōḍai uṇṭēnēgāni nīvu cēyucunna ī sūcaka kriyalanu evaḍunu cēyalēḍani āyanatō ceppenu.
3.3: Anduku yēsu–okaḍu kotta gā janmin̄citēnēgāni atanu Dēvuni rājyamunu cūḍalēḍani nītō niścayamugā ceppucunnānanenu.
